# Installing and loading tidyr
```{r}
#install.package("tidyr)
library(tidyr)
```


# Religeon and Income Survey dataset
```{r}
head(relig_income)
```

# US Rent Income dataset
```{r}
head(us_rent_income)
```


# Reshaping with Pivot longer
```{r}
relig_income %>%
  pivot_longer(!religion, 
               names_to = "income", 
               values_to = "count")
```

# Reshaping with Pivot wider
```{r}
us_rent_income %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = variable,
    values_from = estimate,
    values_fill = 0
  )
```
